original_title: 彼女のいない1ヶ月間、禁欲を我慢できず彼女の親友に手を出してしまった僕は、何と14日間ものあいだ…
overview: A couple who just started living together and her best friend, they are a threesome. Then, the couple's girlfriend will leave her cohabitation apartment on her overseas business trip, and the boyfriend promises her abstinence for a month and a half during her absence as a proof of her love. About a month after her departure, when her best friend Moe came to visit the couple's house ... the boyfriend who had increased sexual desire approached her cute best friend, and from there the physical relationship began to release libido. To go. Moe Tenshi's all-out lust drama.
title: While My Girlfriend Was Away For A Month, I Could No Longer Endure Celibacy, And Decided To Go For My Girlfriend's Best Friend Instead, And For 14 Whole Days... Moe Amatsuka
